column4: I just logged into my freshly updated (Jaunty --> Karmic) machine and now I have a dock that looks like it's from OSX. What's the name of this program?
BTW -- I remember installing this a long time ago but I don't know what it's called. I want to configure it, but not sure where to start.
Ah, sounds familiar. Yeah I installed it a while ago but disabled it. For some reason, it's decided to be enabled again.
